title: Adult ESL & GED in Southeast PA
name: Adult ESL & GED in Southeast PA
description:
A Map by Toddm

A map of sites in Southeast Pennsylvania offering free ESL, GED, or ABE classes for adults, along with contact information for the agencies providing the service.

properties.name: Literacy Council of Norristown ESL Class
properties.description: Posted by Toddm113 E. Airy St., Norristown, PA 19401Classes meet in First Presbyterian Church Building. Class times: Mondays and Wednesdays, 6:30 to 8:00 or 8:30 (depending on English level); Please come early to first class to take a placement test. Classes are open-entry, which means you can begin any time of the year. Classes run from September to late May, with some limited summer classes Fee: One-time 5. fee Contact information: (phone) 610-292-8515; (e-mail) lcnlit@lycos.com; We also offer one-on-one or small group tutoring to adults in basic literacy, ESL, and GED. There is no charge to the student for this service. You must call our office to schedule a pre-test, at which time you would be put on the waiting list to get a tutor. We have both daytime and evening tutors available.
